articles.title: Bombshell investigation rocks English cricket
articles.description: A former England cricket star in his 40s is reportedly being probed by cops over an alleged sexual assault and spiking of two women at a pub, The Sun reports.
articles.content:
A former England cricket star in his 40s is reportedly being probed by cops over an alleged sexual assault and spiking of two women at a pub, The Sun reports.

articles.title: Asia Cup: Post-conflict India vs Pakistan cricket match divides opinion
articles.description: Ahead of India vs Pakistan at the Asia Cup, fans and experts predict the post-war acrimony to overshadow the cricket.
articles.content: Dubai, United Arab Emirates When cricketers from India and Pakistan step onto the field for their Asia Cup 2025 match on Sunday, a lot more than two points will be on the line, according to cricket f… [+5884 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
